alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued June 03 at 10:07PM EDT until June 05 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. For the Coastal Flood Watch, up to one foot of inundation above ground level possible in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 6 AM EDT Sunday, especially around the time of high tide. For the Coastal Flood Watch, late Sunday night, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, yards are flooded on Saint George Island, and water will begin covering the road leading to the island, especially if there is wave action. At 3.5 feet, water covers roads on St. Georges Island, is in yards, and approaches structures. To the east, inundation occurs at multiple marinas off St. Mary`s River, Smith Creek, and Jutland Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above normal. The next high tide at Coltons Point is at 3:19 AM, at Point Lookout 1:56 AM, and at Piney Point 2:43 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/03 AM 3.1 1.5 1.3 1.0 Minor 04/04 PM 3.3 1.7 1.9 0.5 Minor 05/03 AM 3.4 1.8 1.6 0.5 Minor 05/04 PM 3.0 1.4 1.6 0.5 Minor 06/04 AM 3.0 1.4 1.2 1.0 Minor 06/04 PM 2.4 0.8 1.0 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
